NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Basketball and Attendance or the cell corresponding to Movies and Viewership?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.43 to 0.55?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Movies, Attendance), (Music, Attendance), (Music, Merchandise), (Music, Ratings), (Music, Revenue), (Music, Royalties), (Movies, Social Media), (Music, Social Media), (Music, Sponsorship), (Music, Streaming Hours), (Music, Ticket Sales), (Movies, Viewership), (Music, Viewership), (Publishing, Viewership)}.
